sentence.Network_en: The stucture rules have the locating, directing , equidistance , rythmicity, oblique - arrangement, side - pitching property.
sentence.Network_cn: 其构造规律具有定位性 、 向性、距性 、 律性 、 列性和侧伏性.

sentence.Network_en: This paper proposes an equidistance interface joint , which is new - style and high performance in mechanical driver.
sentence.Network_cn: 本文提出了机械传动中一种新型、性能优良的联接方式--等距型面联接.

sentence.Network_en: The Principle of Equidistance: Choose lodging ( eg. hotel ) equidistance to all Service Points.
sentence.Network_cn: 同等距离之原理: 选择与各个服务点同等距离的住宿 ( 如:旅馆 ).
